website_summaries.verdict: A good buy for a compact, functional wood stand. If you don't have much space, this coat rack is a good choice.
pros: A stable, inexpensive coat rack that is easy to assemble
The natural wood color has an appealing look
It's a functional item and good quality for the price
cons: Some of the colors didn't match description

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for the Money
customer_reviews.text: You wouldn't expect much for $22 for a coat tree. However, this one does the job holding coats, and looks good!. I got it in a couple of days and was able to put it together in less than 10 minutes with no tools. There aren't any instructions with mine, but I was able to figure it out rapidly after looking at the picture on the box. If you want a basic coat tree (I got the burgundy/cherry model), I would recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: S Trent

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coat Rack - A Little Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great coat rack for the price. It was very easy to assemble and the product seems to be decent quality. The color was also as described. It is a little uneven. Kind of leans a little. Because it is a tripod, if you hand too many heavy things on one side, it will fall over. You have to make sure to evenly distribute the hanging items. Works great in place of an entry closet though. Small profile and pretty enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtyn

customer_reviews.title: Unstable and Easily Broken
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble and looked good, but less than twelve hours after I put it together and hung coats on it it had fallen over and both the base and one of the hooks had snapped in half. *edit* I would like to add that YH-Goods was very quick to respond and offer me a replacement or refund for this, so while I wasn't happy with this particular product I would order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Skelley

customer_reviews.title: An awful coat rack
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack has a terribly narrow base, which caused it to be top heaven with just a few coats on the racks. It always fell over if anyone touched it lightly. I hated it and threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Stirling Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Piece of.........
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought you Can’t beat the price. The rack hadn’t toppled over and was holding 3 bulky coats and 2 lightweight jackets. But then Thanksgiving came with the coldest weather in 100 years. By dinner time the rack had toppled over and broke. I threw away the box and so now I can’t return the item $ down the drain. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy

customer_reviews.title: Made with inferior products
customer_reviews.text: It looks very nice and is easy to put together but it is made with very inferior wood. One arm broke within a month and the actual body broke right in half a year after buying it. Not worth it unless you are going to just hang hats on it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Does what it supposed to do, well.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to remove the mess on the hallway bench, so I can see the bench. The hallway closet was a bit far away & full of junks, which is another issues. The coat tree was put to together easily without any problem. It is all dependent on the precise drilling of the holes & the screws of the attachment. My product did not show any error in precision. I can imagine, on a bad day, in a factory far far away, a worker or a computer made an 1mm error, then... Never mind, mine works & looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Bbear

customer_reviews.title: The best budget wood furniture I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of cheap wooden furniture over the years, and coat racks are the worst. There are always cracks. There are always bad screw threads. I've been using cracked and collapsing coat racks on the verge of tipping over for years. This one is not. It's perfect. No cracks, no awkward production defects: absolute perfection to assemble and use. It's unbelievable. I've immediately ordered a second one. I really thought I'd have to buy a $100+ coat rack someday but now I won't. I will be buying more Zober products in the future if they're as good as this one. Thanks, guys.
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my new coat rack. It looks great in the space I put it. It's a nice dark chocolate brown wood. It could not have been easier to assemble. No tools needed -- just screw the various pieces together and voila! I've put quite a bit of weight on it, including my bridge bag, my doggie care bag, my ipad, laptop bag, etc. Despite the weight, it stays perfectly balanced. It was just the solution I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: BackHomeAgain

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding bags, so simple to assemble a child can do it
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this coat rack, it is just what I needed to keep bags off the floor of a cupboard. I didn’t use piece 3 so it would fit comfortable under the hanging rod, but still have all 6 hooks available. The assembly instructions were really clear (except that it didn’t specify which sections to exclude to adjust the height - simple enough to work out though). My 5-year-old (yep!) put it together in 10 minutes. The only thing I don’t like is that the stand doesn’t sit flush against the floor (the ends are angled), so it’s not possible to put felt pads on to protect wooden floor.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and great design.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other hangers on Amazon this ones' design is great. Since the load is shifted towards the center it doesn't put weight on either side that would cause it to be unbalanced. It was easy to put together just follow the directions. Solid wood beautiful finish. Would recommend. This is my honest review, I was not influenced for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Coat Rack Stand
customer_reviews.text: The stand is made of pure wood. It was very easy to assemble. Took me less than 10 minutes to set it up. It is simple but looks nice and in good quality. I have it sit in the corner at entrance. I have all my daily dog walking stuff hanging on it, convenient and organized well. It is definitely worth the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OneJust PassBy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live in northern Illinois. We have heavy coats here so this thing is PACKED and it's going strong. Very sturdy, I've never worried about it falling over. Love the color. Cherry matches the trim of my house perfectly which will be nice during the warmer months when you can actually SEE it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Frees up space and makes things look tidy again.
customer_reviews.text: The Zober cherry Coat Rack with 6 hooks arrived within 4 days of my placing the order. Packaging was simple, everything neat and in its own plastic marked wrap. The instructions were very clear and simple to put together in not more than 10 minutes. It has a strong and sturdy weight and build. Looks very nice! Happy with my purchase. This is for my bedroom for clothing that may be worn again so it doesn’t end up on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected Multi-tasker
customer_reviews.text: We needed to give our cat 'subcutaneous hydration.' (Picture an I.V. but with water). We needed something sturdy and tall to hang the bag from. They sell medical devices for this but they are pricey, and what do you do with them afterward? So we got this coat tree. It did the job beautifully, and will continue to look beautiful for years to come when it transitions back to its original purpose. Oh, and the cherry color looks great with our furniture too.
customer_reviews.author: j karstens

customer_reviews.title: A product that has truly changed my life.
customer_reviews.text: It has been a hard year for me FYI. I had to make some strong changes to my habits to make me the person I'm thankful to be now. All thanks to this coat rack. It's been cold here in Illinois, the weathers been flip flopping from mild to moderate. I kept just switching between so many different degrees of warm wear I HAD SO MANY COATS. The High-Grade Wooden Tree Coat rack Stand was so easy to tighten together, the oak shines. IT CAN HOLD ALL MY HEAVY COATS. I feel better, I look better man thanks.
customer_reviews.author: amazonadict1234

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, But Not Strong
customer_reviews.text: The finish is gorgeous, however, when I placed one of my full-length down coats on the hook, it toppled over. I didn't pay attention to the weight of the rack which is an indicator of the weight capacity overall. It's a good idea, in my opinion, to place into a large walk-in closet to hang bras previously worn (just 2-3 times to re-wear bras before they are too dirty to continue), or bags, scarves, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to hang the coats, keys, etc. on, instead of them getting piled up on the bench in my foyer or the couch. This is perfect. It's nothing fancy, but we didn't want it to be a noticeable piece of furniture. It stands in the corner and does it's job. It's nice quality and very sturdy, surprisingly. We pile quite a bit on it at times and it has yet to fall over.
customer_reviews.author: mandican

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I have gone through many assembly required pieces and this BY FAR THE BEST!!! If you had doubts please let me assure you that you will not be disappointed. Good quality item and so sturdy. I am so pleased. I hope they have more items for me to fill my home with. Very rich looking. I just can't think of enough positive feedback!!!😀😁😊😁
customer_reviews.author: B. MeyersTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: solid, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I had it put together ten minutes after opening the box. The base is steady, the pieces were all smooth, the pegs fit well into the holes. My sole quibble was that no matter what orientation I started screwing the top section in, the two middle pegs kept ending up almost directly one over the other, making one of them ore or less useless. Definitely not enough of a gripe to send it back, especially for the price, or even enough to take off a whole star.
customer_reviews.author: D. DeFrank

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap material snapped in half
customer_reviews.text: Coat rack looks nice, but is not made well I had two light weight jackets hanging on it and the wood snapped in half.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: The coat rack is missing one of the arms, it had 5 instead of 6 arms
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy to assemble coat rack and looks good, it is also fairly stable. The center pole is divided in sections which screw together. They don't align perfectly though, and are not 100% perfect when screwed together, but look good enough. Mine had only 5 of the six hooks that screw into the center pole, but it is still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Jerian

customer_reviews.title: Cute , as well as functional
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughter, who has excellent taste. She is an artist, and loved the design of it . Clean and simple. Its sturdy, as well as handsome to look at. So when I was on my Amazon page {without my glasses on} I clicked order again, and now I have one too.
customer_reviews.author: madeline bonomo

customer_reviews.title: attractive, sturdy, useful
customer_reviews.text: I needed a non-obtrusive, functional coat rack for my entryway. This is an attractive (for a coat rack.....) one that I put together in a few minutes...some of the hooks didn't quite fit and I had to wait for somebody stronger to push them in, but I did and they did so it is just what I wanted. Hasn't tipped or crashed or fallen apart...so good value.
customer_reviews.author: slotravel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great product easily to assemble. I bought this one same day as another metal coat rack. I had this one together in about 8min and the other one took an hour and that was cheating with a cordless drill. Has a nice finish and looks classy. I've learned that once full of clothes it doesn't matter as you can hardly see the rack though. Seems sturdy and has not fallen over yet and I have a cat who likes chaos.
customer_reviews.author: Nate the great

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy assembly, takes less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Impressive bag and hat stand due to the quality and price. Well packaged with all the pieces. Extremely easy assembly, takes less than 5 minutes. No screws or hardware involved since all the pieces just twist into each other. As for sturdiness and balance it could tip over is bags are too lopsided. The color of the cherry wood is just as pictured. Did require some airing out due to the strong smell of lacquer but it's still a great stand
customer_reviews.author: kenith Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice coat rack that's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkably study coat rack for the price. Sure, you can overload it and get it to tip, but as long as you distribute the weight somewhat evenly, it'll hold several coats quite well. It goes together easily, and when complete, it looks like it should have cost more than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Cushman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing design
customer_reviews.text: This coat hanger is ellegant and beautifully constructed. It arrived in pieces in a small bix. All pieces were numbered on their wrappers, no need to match anything up. Instructions were simple and it took me - not technically minded - less than 10 minutes to put it together with no tools, because all yhe pieces simply screw into each other. Smazing
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sarah

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.It was easy to put together,no tools needed.Right now I have hats and purses as well as clothes on it .Doesn't take up a lot of space and it looks like I paid more for it than I did.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, but sturdy coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive, but sturdy coat rack. You do have to assemble it -- basically screw several pieces together, but very straightforward. And despite having to assemble it, it is very sturdy. I bought it to use at work and put several hefty bags on it. It has never fallen or tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: Monica O.

customer_reviews.title: Just the coat hanger i was seeking !
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Looks like rosewood. Has great construction. Feels nice and smooth. Serves its purposes well. Good piece of construction all around. Thank you to everyone involved in providing this product. (:
customer_reviews.author: Aqua man

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a bulky winter coat, beanie and neck scarves. Its holding pretty well and not tumbling as I feared. Assembly was quick too. Using a little bit oil on the screws makes it easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvajit

customer_reviews.title: Great little ‘everything’ rack!
customer_reviews.text: It’s basic, holds coats, purses, bags, dog leashes, hats, etc. I bought the white and the cherry finishes and both look great. Fits into small spaces, too!
customer_reviews.author: PumpkinSpice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome coat hanger
customer_reviews.text: I currently live in an apartment and space is limited. We bought this because during the winter we use lots of coats and they mostly ended up on the backs of chairs or on the sofa. Now that I have it I can definitely say my living room looks so much more organized. It's super sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Cleyde

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a hat rack for all of my husbands caps. It was very easy to assemble and made of good quality wood. I was able to hang all of his hats from each of the pegs and it hides nicely behind a door. It would be sturdy enough to hang coats and jackets on.
customer_reviews.author: First time buyer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It goes together well but the screw from the base to the tree stripped and had to be redone, I mean had I not been a carpenter, all I could done is try using epoxy or another kind of adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Morphis

customer_reviews.title: Not “High-grade” wood with my coat rack.
customer_reviews.text: I finally put this together, and as soon as I screw in the last peg, it falls over, broken into two pieces. The wood looks damaged (see picture) and snapped. This particular coat rack this is NOT “High-grade” wood. Of course it’s out of the return window, but I’m hoping to get ahold of someone. It seemed like it would have been sturdy if not for the damaged wood.
customer_reviews.author: Me@Me

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: A little weird once assembled because the stain on all the parts isn't even or exact, so you can definitely tell it came in many pieces. Very easy to assemble and serves its purpose. Sturdy enough, though you need to be careful about placing coats evenly on it so it doesn't get too heavy on one side -- it will topple if this happens. In general, it does what it's supposed to and looks fine when covered by coats and hats.
customer_reviews.author: Payton Harcum

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is exactly what I wanted. It went together without tools, with VERY easy instructions and took less than 5 minutes to put together. Other than the carton, very little wasted packaging to get rid of. The coat rack is sturdy, is currently holding 2 winter coats, a hoody, 2 hats and 2 scarves as well as a retractable dog leash. I’m so glad I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent stand but it's not as nice as I had hoped. I was purchasing to replace a wooden rack that had broken. Will be used but when it breaks I'll be looking at a different one.
customer_reviews.author: EDURP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a small space in a remodeled bedroom. We have a cape, and the ceiling is slanted. We needed a coat rack that could be smaller or larger if we moved it. This was easy to put together. Sturdier than I thought it would be. We used 2 of the 3 sections and still got 3 hangers. Perfect for a smaller space and the wood grain is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina M. Persell McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easily put together.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together with all pieces intact. Nice color. I have it on a wooden floor and cut 1” strips of Velcro (the soft side) and stuck on angled part of the legs folded to protect the floor. It should come with hardwood floor protection but no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for such a wonderful product. Easy to put together. I assembled it in 5 minutes without even reading the instructions. There are no loose nuts and bolts. the final product is sturdy and very stylish. Best wishes to vendors and manufacturers of such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Good quality coat rack
customer_reviews.text: The rack looks nice and is easy to assemble. The price is reasonable. The only downside is its tendency to fall if overloaded on one side, which seems to be because the three base legs are not spread that wide. It makes a good coat or hat rack.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat Rack!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased this coat rack for approximately $22.00 and its definitely worth every penny. The assembly was very easy it took me 5 minutes max to put together. The rack is sturdy, holds all of our jackets/sweaters with ease. The darker cherry oak color looks much better than I expected. All our guests think we paid over $100 for it, which is typically a good sign.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed for our walk way. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Finally i freed the chair top. Night clothes go on this now. i took one section off to reduce the height. Looks like a mini tree otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Morvuhs

customer_reviews.title: It looks like what it is, cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This coat tree was easy to assemble but is flimsy. The color exactly matches my cherry furniture. The lower pegs are really close to he floor. Basically it is nothing special and looks like you paid $19.99 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, but not entirely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The wood finish on this rack is attractive, but if you place too many heavy coats/bags on it it tends to wobble and fall over.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Yep its the ugly functional hall tree. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Recipient put together quickly, and you have to position heavier items carefully. (There aren't any gravity deniers out there are there?) Have hung a few not- quite -dry -from -the -Laundromat -towels on it also.
customer_reviews.author: AuntiePeg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it , good quality for the price, just wanted something simple and not expensive, cherry would makes it look more expensive that what I paid for it, and matches rest of my furniture..shipping was quick too very happy . 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already used and unstable?
customer_reviews.text: Mine seems to have been already heavily use by other people.... and when I hang the first coat; the tree coat rack stand just falls. I need anothe weight to balance it... that sucks.
customer_reviews.author: PJL

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for my husband to hang his work clothes. This is perfect! Sturdy, even on carpet, to hang his heavy pants, sweatshirts, etc. Easy assembly, no tools required. Can't believe the quality for this price.
customer_reviews.author: satisfied customer from DE

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and very easy to assemble. It could be a little "tippy" if things are not hung carefully on it. Overall well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: 1 Alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and its height adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and that it’s height adjustable. You can take out one piece of it to make it shorter
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: It broke, from the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend Edit: It's been lass then 2 months, When throwing it out, it turns out there's another branch that is about to break. So it's the general material quality not just a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: PercyXLee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased. One worry I got from the picture was, would it stay up once clothing was hung on it. Yes it does. And it’s attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Cordes

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble.no tools took 10 minutes..is it gorgeous..no but in this price range it looks good and relatively sturdy..id rebuy again as needed
customer_reviews.author: johnny h jones iii

customer_reviews.title: Good coat rack
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's sturdy as long as you balance the weight and placement of your coats. The pegs are arranged too close together for larger coats.
customer_reviews.author: Iafydss

customer_reviews.title: Handy Rack
customer_reviews.text: I use mine in the bedroom ..robe, pair of jeans and pj’s not for too many heavy things. This works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done and looks nice enough. For the price, it's good. I currently have several costs on it and it does well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wooden Tree Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight but it's perfect for my Harry Potter house robe and scarf! Very easy to put together and has a beautiful wood finish.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Smith

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to any household!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent item: Sturdy. Attractive. Easy to assemble. Excellent assembly instructions. Very useful for hanging hats and coats in hallways, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: It holds my coats! I like the color! It's a bit on the light side though - I threw my heavy coat on it and it fell over once so I put a 5lb weight at the bottom but if you're careful it shouldn't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not expensive, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Solid enough. Went together easily. Not the most attractive stand in the world, but nothing falls off, so far. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lane P Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to keep our jackets organized and away from chairs and banister.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Reminded me of groot 🤓😊😉
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty awesome, although the one I recieved had some areas on it that was a little messed up.. I'm not to worried about it. Looks great in our house matches all the wood and furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived well packaged, very easy to put together (5 minutes), the Cherry is a rich color. Balanced perfectly and I get compliments on it all the time. It looks much more expensive than it costs. No regrets at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money paid
customer_reviews.text: The coat rack is what I expected. It was easy to put together and serves his purpose.
customer_reviews.author: nightowl6927

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, pretty sturdy for light jackets, sweaters, etc. but enough big winter coats may tip it over. I have a good amount of stuff on there right now and that baby’s not going anywhere! Just make sure to balance it out and you’re good!
customer_reviews.author: Dia3099

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Tips over a lot even though there’s equal balance on all hooks, spend a bit more and get a heavier one
customer_reviews.author: Luc E.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and elegant
customer_reviews.text: High quality item easy to assemble looks and feels sturdy,I highly recommend this product,thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Chano

customer_reviews.title: Nice rack!!
customer_reviews.text: This rack is great. So easy to put together in like 5 minutes. Sturdy and looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I recommend--it's a great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured and VERY easy to assemble. I left one of the extensions out so it would be shorter and it's perfect. I've hung coats, sweaters, and a handbag on it; it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This product comes in about 7 pieces, each a foot in length or less. Instructions are simple and assembly took less than 5 minutes. Material seems great quality, and it holds up well with weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lacking quality control
customer_reviews.text: The finish os very nice and was easy to put together. However, I only used half of the sections and it is NOT plum and very noticeable. Leaning Tower of Pisa
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: assembled coat rack without any problems... seems strong enough for the job... color was as described... nice finish on the wood... using all six hooks...no issues...
customer_reviews.author: connie373

customer_reviews.title: Handy and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain with this coat rack. It was super easy to assemble, it’s looks great and has lots of pegs for hanging. I haven’t noticed it getting wobbly over time, but if it did you just twist the pegs tighter. The price was pretty good too! Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to knock over. Base just needs a few improvements but great for the price
customer_reviews.author: adam young

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional rack
customer_reviews.text: We put this coat rack at the front hallway door--it has had continuous use, and doesn't get in the way at all!
customer_reviews.author: MZ

customer_reviews.title: Great coat rack.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a coat rack that had a small footprint, and this is it. It looks great and plenty sturdy. I highly recommend this. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Looks fantastic. It matches the rest of my room perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I read the reviews and chose this coat rack. Very nice and sturdy- no tools needed at all. It looks like it cost much more.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well-balanced! Sort of looks a little flimsy in the pictures but is actually pretty heavy. Assembly took less than five minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Banerjee

customer_reviews.title: A Stable Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: It is a coat rack... Does its job perfectly, and it is quite stable too. There isn't much to really review about this!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack was perfect for our house, you can add height as the kids grow. Easy to put together. Nice wood. Holds everything, even backpacks!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: This was very nice and easy to put together thankfully. The quality appears to be great and this item will be very useful especially during the months of rain and cold. My only suggestion would be to have it in ebony!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: It falls down -- no weight to keep it standing
customer_reviews.text: If you don't have equally heavy coats on opposing hooks, or some way (like placing free weights on the legs), this thing will hit the ground like a felled tree
customer_reviews.author: Aymon Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Great coat stand
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Base not too big but stable. “Branches” of tree well sized and spaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi J

customer_reviews.title: The holes for part 7 are exactly the same size ...
customer_reviews.text: The holes for part 7 are exactly the same size as the screws for part 6 so it is impossible to put them together as the instructions indicate. Very frustrating. I will send a message to Zober to see what they can do to make this right. Update: When I contacted the company, they immediately responded and sent new parts which work perfectly. I was very impressed with their courtesy and quick help. I would buy this again and would recommend the company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clean up
customer_reviews.text: I have all bookbags and jackets dropped off before entering the room and nothing on the floor I love it!
customer_reviews.author: E-Epp’s

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Solid, well made, nice finish, all pieces lined up and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but you have to be careful how you hang clothes on it. It tends to fall over easily if not hung balanced on each side.
customer_reviews.author: Nettie B

customer_reviews.title: Parts not right
customer_reviews.text: Product came with 2 #3 as shown in pic so I only have 3 posts to hang from
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for our entryway in Florida
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our entryway in Florida. We have no entryway closet so this is a very attractive solution to that problem. It doesn't take up a lot of space and is good looking...ant the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: ottojf

customer_reviews.title: Nice Coat Rack
customer_reviews.text: Arrival time was great! The rack is very nice and great for my office.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. A

customer_reviews.title: Great hatrack!
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to assemble, no tools needed, looks good in the corner. Bought it as a hat rack, so not sure how well it would do with heavy coats, but seems sturdy enough and was certainly a good value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: SLOguy

customer_reviews.title: Great 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Love. Made of real wood and it was super easy to put together. Looks nice too, web it’s not covered in jackets that it. 🙂
customer_reviews.author: The Manster

customer_reviews.title: did the job
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say this is the BEST coat rack ever...but for the price you can't beat it! Contrary to some of the reviews I read, it was very easy to assemble. Just simply screwed together. Not as tall as I thought but works fine for my office. I have about 3 coats, a purse, and other bags on it on any given day. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but a heavy coat tips it over.
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was more sturdy from the bottom. A heavy coat tips it over very easily.
customer_reviews.author: George Dee

product_meta.title: High-Grade Wooden Tree Coat Rack Stand, 6 Hooks - Super Easy Assembly NO Tools Required - 3 Adjustable Sizes Free Standing Coat Rack, Hallway/Entryway Coat Hanger Stand for Clothes, Suits, Accessories
feature_bullets: HEAVY DUTY CONSTRUCTION - Super Durable - Made of 1.5 inch thick, high-quality lacquered pinewood screw-on pieces and 3 prong legs for stability that supports multiple heavy garments and outerwear.
EASY TO ASSEMBLE - No Tools Required - Assemble the coat rack in just a few quick steps. No tools are required, and a clear assembly instruction manual walks users clearly through the entire process.

MULTIPURPOSE - Clothing and Accessories - 6 sturdy, convenient hooks allow you to hang several clothing items such as coats, jackets, and cardigans along with accessories like scarves, hats, handbags, briefcases, laptop bags, and umbrellas.

SPACE SAVING - This coat rack takes up minimal space in foyers, living rooms, office work space, Doctors' offices and keeps coats and accessories out of cramped closets and easily accessible with hooks all around the rack.

ADJUSTABLE SIZES - Kid Friendly - Assemble the coat rack according to the height you need; use 2 sections for a toddler-sized rack, 3 sections for a kid’s sized rack, or use all 4 for a standard, adult sized rack.
